        public ODBConnect​(java.lang.String dbHost,
                  int port,
                  java.lang.String pw,
                  java.lang.String uID)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        contructor
        Note:
        - serialized Java object as key must have an implemented equals-method
        - Leading or trailing spaces are consisdered as part of a string
        Parameters:
        dbHost - String, JODB Server hostname or IP
        port - int, JODB server port
        pw - String, User's password
        uID - String, User's ID
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - thrown by JAVA

      • getPrivilege

        public int getPrivilege​()
        getPrivilege of user of this connection
        Privileg: 0: read only, 1: read/write, 2: read/write/delete, 3: 2 + superuser
        Returns:
        int, UserPrivilege: 0, 1, 2, 3

      • unlock

        public boolean unlock​(java.lang.String dbName)
        unlock all locked keys of this dbName (Note: NO Rollback, NOR Commit is then possible)
        Parameters:
        dbName - String, the DB name.
        Returns:
        boolean true: key is unlocked, false if unknown key or key wasn't locked

      • lock

        public boolean lock​(java.lang.String dbName,
                    java.lang.Object key)
        lock() lock key. Must be invoked before delete or update.
        By delete: locked key is released if delete was successful
        Parameters:
        dbName - String, the DB name.
        key - String
        Returns:
        boolean true: key is locked, false if unknown key or key was locked

      • unlock

        public boolean unlock​(java.lang.String dbName,
                      java.lang.Object key)
        unlock() unlock key (Note: NO Rollback, NOR Commit is then possible)
        Parameters:
        dbName - String, the DB name.
        key - String
        Returns:
        boolean true: key is unlocked, false if unknown key or key wasn't locked

      • rollback

        public boolean rollback​(java.lang.String dbName,
                        java.lang.Object key)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        rollback() key must be locked before ROLLBACK
        Parameters:
        dbName - String, the DB name.
        key - String, key of object to be rolled back
        Returns:
        boolean true if rollback is successful, false: unknown key, no rollback
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - thrown by JAVA

      • rollback

        public boolean rollback​(java.lang.String dbName)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        rollback() ALL modified objects regardless of locked or unlocked
        Parameters:
        dbName - String, the DB name.
        Returns:
        boolean true if rollback is successful, false: nothing to rollback
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - thrown by JAVA if cls not found

      • close

        public void close​(java.lang.String dbName)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        close. All locked keys will be freed. Data may get lost if commitAll wasn't executed before close
        Parameters:
        dbName - String, the DB name.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - thrown by JAVA

      • save

        public void save​(java.lang.String dbName)
          throws java.lang.Exception
        save. Save and do all commits, then free all the locked keys.
        Parameters:
        dbName - String, the DB name.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - thrown by JAVA

      • xDelete

        public boolean xDelete​(java.lang.String dbName,
                       java.lang.Object key)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        xDelete locks, deletes and completes a commit if nothing happened in-between
        Parameters:
        dbName - String, DB name
        key - Object key of/for the object
        Returns:
        boolean true if success
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - thrown by JAVA if cls not found

        Returns:
        boolean true if success

               throws java.lang.Exception

        Parameters:
        dbName - String, the DB name.
        key - String, key of object to be rolled back
        Returns:
        boolean true if commit is successful, false: unknown key, no commit

        public boolean isAutoCommit​()
        isAutoCommit( )
        Returns:
        boolean, true: autoCommit is set

      • autoCommit

        public boolean autoCommit​(boolean mode)
        autoCommit( ) set AutoCommit to all dbs belonged to this Connection.
        Parameters:
        mode - boolean, true: set autoCommit (1A/26), false: reset autoCommit (1B/27)
        Returns:
        boolean, true: successful, else FAILED

        key - String
        Returns:
        boolean true key is unlocked or locked by owner
